forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a high near 60. East wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
